thread.title: BRANDI
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by BRANDI

author: BRANDI
title: BRANDI
text: We had a very good experience while shopping around we ended up going back a second day and each time the staff was very attentive and helpful. We ended up buying a few piece of furniture and they are wonderful and the delivery man was very nice and helpful so overall we are happy customers.
